General.Name: Ponni Sugars (Erode) Limited
General.Description: Ponni Sugars (Erode) Limited manufactures and sells sugar in India. It operates through two segments: Sugar and Cogeneration. The company also engages in the cogeneration of power. It also exports its products. The company was formerly known as SPB Sugars and Chemicals Limited and changed its name to Ponni Sugars (Erode) Limited in January 2000. Ponni Sugars (Erode) Limited was incorporated in 1996 and is based in Chennai, India.

0.Name: Mr. Ramanathan  Narayanan ACA, ACMA, ACS, B Com.
